detail_desc: Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a tunic and pair of leggings. Tunic in soft, lightweight denim made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with decorative frills, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length boiler suit in washed organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs at the top and flap chest pockets. Detachable, adjustable belt at the waist, a button fly, long, gently flared sleeves and straight, wide legs with patch front pockets and back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded canvas jacket with a fleece-lined, drawstring hood with a peak. Zip and wind flap with press-studs and a concealed hook and loop fastening down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Flap chest and front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and two inner pockets, one with a zip and one with a press-stud. Quilted lining.
Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Long-sleeved top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front and elastication at the back, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Shorter top in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and smocking at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flared skirt in sequined mesh with a satin-covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood, stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Padded, gently tailored gilet with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton and linen weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges. No fasteners.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with a pocket at the top, adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front, and buttons at the sides.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend. Round neck with a press-stud and decorative buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Studio Collection. Trousers in soft leather. Regular waist with a safety button on the inside and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Front pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Straight fit and legs with creases. Lined to the knees. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of puff shorts in a crinkled, organic cotton weave. Shirt with a rounded collar and button placket. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and buttons at the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Knee-length skirt in lightweight cotton twill. High waist with a belt, zip fly, hook-and-eye fastening and large patch pockets. Unlined.
Platform hi-tops in satin with imitation leather details, lacing with speed hooks and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 5.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Wide, straight-cut blouse in a textured cotton and viscose weave with a stand-up collar with a small frill trim. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and buttons down the front.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and an opening and slit at the back.

Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in big hole mesh and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a rib knit containing some wool with a high, elasticated waist. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Sleeveless top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Decorative button band down the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with elasticated cuffs.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gym bag in woven fabric with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Size 35x44.5 cm.

WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Thin metal chain necklace with a decorative metal ring. Adjustable length, approx. 52-59 cm.
Jersey body with a gently draped V-neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a collar and drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Dress in shimmering tulle with short, double-layered butterfly sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck. Satin lining.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Coat in soft bouclé made from a wool blend in a gently rounded shape that tapers to the hem. Notch lapels, buttons down the front and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the top, an adjustable fastening and metal buckle at the heel, leather insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a dungaree dress and long-sleeved top in soft cotton. Dress in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with appliqués and patch pockets at the front, elastication at the back of the waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back. Top in patterned jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative zips and seams on the legs. Zip fly and button. Extra-slim fit.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, patch front pockets, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter approx. 19.5 cm.
Blouse in a slightly textured cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons and flounces at the front, yoke with a box pleat the back and short, flounced sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut jacket in long pile faux fur with cotton twill sections. Collar, press-studs down the front and a tab with press-studs at the hem. Lined.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
